title: Rainbow Mountain Trek
summary: Embark on a spectacular day trek to one of Peru's most photographed natural wonders. Rainbow Mountain (Vinicunca) showcases vibrant mineral deposits creating a stunning rainbow-striped landscape at 5,200m elevation.
description: Rainbow Mountain, known locally as Vinicunca or Monta√±a de Siete Colores (Mountain of Seven Colors), is one of Peru's most recently discovered tourist destinations. This geological marvel features vibrant stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, and blue across its slopes, created by different mineral deposits exposed over millions of years. The trek offers breathtaking high-altitude hiking and spectacular panoramic views of the Ausangate mountain range.
included: Emergency oxygen and first aid kit
physicalRequirement: Good fitness level required. This trek involves high-altitude hiking (5,200m) with steep sections. Acclimatization in Cusco for 2-3 days recommended.

itinerary.title: Cusco to Rainbow Mountain
itinerary.description: Early morning departure from Cusco for the 3-hour drive to the trailhead. Trek through the stunning Ausangate mountain range to reach the colorful Rainbow Mountain.

additionalInfo.food: Breakfast and lunch provided at local restaurants
additionalInfo.safety: Experienced guides with high-altitude training and emergency equipment
additionalInfo.groupSize: Small groups ensure personalized attention and better experience
additionalInfo.altitude: This trek reaches 5,200m elevation - proper acclimatization is essential
